remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现 方法。Implements the method. 默认实现执行以下操作为每个找到的 WS 信任协定：The default implementation does the following for every WS-Trust contract found: 1. WSDL 中包括适当的 Ws-trust 命名空间。Includes the appropriate WS-Trust namespace in the WSDL. 2. 导入相应的 WS 信任架构和所有相关架构。Imports the appropriate WS-Trust schema and all dependent schemas. 3. 修复了为相应的 WS 信任等效项的每个操作的消息。Fixes the Messages of each operation to appropriate WS-Trust equivalents. 公开由 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 的 Ws-trust 协定采用中，并返回出。但 WS 信任消息预期 RST 和 RSTR/RSTRC 返回。The WS-Trust Contract exposed by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) takes a in and returns a out. But WS-Trust messages expect an RST and return an RSTR/RSTRC. 此方法修复适当的 Ws-trust 消息的消息名称。This method fixes the message names with the appropriate WS-Trust messages.
